snippet: By voting early, President Obama and his wife, Michelle, will deprive the news media of a time-honored Election Day photo opportunity: the president and first lady at the ballot box.
abstract: By voting early, President Obama and his wife, Michelle, will deprive the news media of a time-honored Election Day photo opportunity: the president and first lady at the ballot box.

headline.main: Obamas to Vote Early, Hoping Others Do the Same
headline.print_headline: Early Voting: Obamas Won’t Wait for Nov. 6
